tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My mother had difficulty sleeping at night.She was unable to eat enough food as a result of not feeling hungry and her blood level was reduced significantly. Her health was extremely poor. Then I consulted Dr. Fayaz , I am extremely thankful to him for understanding the root cause of all the sufferings she had been going through. Blood pressure was high it's called hypertension. Dr. Fayaz patiently explained to us about what to change in terms of eating habits and prescribed medication that worked like magic. I have been noticing improvement in my mothers health day by day ever since we visited Dr. Fayaz. I am happy to say that my mother has completely recovered and she is very healthy now , her blood level and blood pressure is normal and she sleeps well at night. Extremely thankful to Dr. Fayaz for treating my mother.With this experience I would recommend him for all hypertension related symptoms and general physician* ** ** *** *****
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had contacted Dr.S M Fayaz for my Covid infection. I was checking with another Dr for first 4 days but luckily choose to consult Dr. S M Fayaz which happened to be a blessing. With so much uncertainty surrounding Covid and its treatment where there are so many different opinions.. its was a very anxious time when I got Covid. From the very start Dr not only calmed the anxiety that was there due to Covid but also ensured I was taking the right medication and also provided information on treatment timeline which relaxed me right away knowing what symptoms to look for. Constantly followed up with Dr throughout and was thoroughly impressed on how easy it was reach him , he was always available even when busy he would message and keep track of the patient and always a call away. Post Covid now I am consulting him for my diabetes!
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: In the midst of such pandemic situation where the entire family was in n utter shock after they got to know that I have also fallen in to the deadly Covid. Many thanks to the doctor and my wife for ensuring very good care. I sincerely and genuinely thank Dr S M Fayaz, who without any delay understood the health condition very thoroughly during the call and the way he calmed all us down was really commendable. I was particularly not in favour of going to hospital and get admitted, and Dr Fayaz actually respected and worked around for that decision. He was really cool in responding to ur questions during consultations and always ensured we all stay positive and calm. Those 2 weeks were insanely horrible but Dr Fayaz consultation got us a very good relief. I sincerely thank him again and wish everyone recovers well from this situation. Thanks again Dr Fayaz as u became my life saviour.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback.
